tool_description: Generates multiple alternative routes when the primary route is blocked or heavily congested, considering different routing strategies and preferences.

blocked_route.description: Identifier of the blocked or problematic route

blocked_segments.description: Road segments to avoid in alternative routes

max_alternatives.description: Maximum number of alternative routes to generate (1-10)

route_preference.description: Routing preference: fastest, shortest, scenic, highways

max_detour_factor.description: Maximum detour factor compared to direct route (1.0-3.0)

error_messages: Invalid route ID: Blocked route identifier not found or invalid.
Invalid coordinates: All latitude values must be between -90 and 90, longitude values between -180 and 180.
No blocked segments: At least one blocked segment must be specified.
Invalid alternatives count: max_alternatives must be between 1 and 10.
Invalid preference: Use one of [fastest, shortest, scenic, highways].
Invalid detour factor: max_detour_factor must be between 1.0 and 3.0.
No alternatives found: Unable to generate alternative routes with given constraints.
usage: Provide blocked_route ID, origin/destination coordinates, and blocked_segments array. Set max_alternatives to control how many routes to generate, route_preference for routing strategy, and max_detour_factor to limit how far alternatives can deviate.

route_distances.description: Distance in kilometers for each alternative route

estimated_times.description: Estimated travel time in minutes for each alternative

route_ratings.description: Quality rating (1-10) for each alternative route
